title.rendered: Phone Pe joins hands with Smile Foundation for the cause of child education

content.rendered:
PhonePe in collaboration with Give India has joined hands with Smile Foundation for the cause of education of underprivileged children. PhonePe has launched its Donations category, and Smile Foundation is among the first few NGOs to be featured on the donations category on the portal through this partnership.

On PhonePe, giving will be at the fingertips of everyday people who can now donate to educate a child. This brings Smile Foundation and PhonePe closer to the collective dream of simplified giving of everyday people.

Smile Foundation is an NGO in India directly benefitting over 750,000 children and their families every year, through more than 350 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 1000 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
